A Just Share of the Profits.--Let not authors be urged either to give away or to sell their right to 
                                                                           165
the books they have written. Let them receive a just share of the profits of their work; then let them regard their means as a trust from God, to be administered according to the wisdom that He shall impart.-- Testimonies, Vol. 7, pp. 176-178. (1902.)
